1: שִׁמְע֥וּ <sup>8085 </sup> <n>Hear</n> דְבַר־ <sup>1697 </sup> <n>the word</n> יְהוָ֖ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n> בְּנֵ֣י <sup>1121 </sup> <n>ye children</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> כִּ֣י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>Because</n> רִ֤יב <sup>7379 </sup> <n>hath a controversy</n> לַֽיהוָה֙ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>for the LORD</n> עִם־ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>against</n> יוֹשְׁבֵ֣י <sup>3427 </sup> <n>with the inhabitants</n> הָאָ֔רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>of the land</n> כִּ֠י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>Because</n> אֵין־ <sup>369 </sup> <n>there</n> אֱמֶ֧ת <sup>571 </sup> <n>because [there is] no truth</n> וְֽאֵין־ <sup>369 </sup> <n>is no</n> חֶ֛סֶד <sup>2617 </sup> <n>nor mercy</n> וְאֵֽין־ <sup>369 </sup> <n>there</n> דַּ֥עַת <sup>1847 </sup> <n>nor knowledge</n> אֱלֹהִ֖ים <sup>430 </sup> <n>of God</n> בָּאָֽרֶץ׃ <sup>776 </sup> <n>in the land</n>
2: אָלֹ֣ה <sup>422 </sup> <n>By swearing</n> וְכַחֵ֔שׁ <sup>3584 </sup> <n>and lying</n> וְרָצֹ֥חַ <sup>7523 </sup> <n>and killing</n> וְגָנֹ֖ב <sup>1589 </sup> <n>and stealing</n> וְנָאֹ֑ף <sup>5003 </sup> <n>and committing adultery</n> פָּרָ֕צוּ <sup>6555 </sup> <n>they break out</n> וְדָמִ֥ים <sup>1818 </sup> <n>and blood</n> בְּדָמִ֖ים <sup>1818 </sup> <n>blood</n> נָגָֽעוּ׃ <sup>5060 </sup> <n>toucheth</n>
3: עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> כֵּ֣ן ׀ <sup>3651 </sup> <n>after that</n> תֶּאֱבַ֣ל <sup>56 </sup> <n>mourn</n> הָאָ֗רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>Therefore shall the land</n> וְאֻמְלַל֙ <sup>535 </sup> <n>therein shall languish</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>and everyone</n> יוֹשֵׁ֣ב <sup>3427 </sup> <n>and every one that dwelleth</n> בָּ֔הּ בְּחַיַּ֥ת <sup>2416 </sup> <n>with the beasts</n> הַשָּׂדֶ֖ה <sup>7704 </sup> <n>of the field</n> וּבְע֣וֹף <sup>5775 </sup> <n>and with the fowls</n> הַשָּׁמָ֑יִם <sup>8064 </sup> <n>of heaven</n> וְגַם־ <sup>1571 </sup> <n>and also</n> דְּגֵ֥י <sup>1709 </sup> <n>yea the fishes</n> הַיָּ֖ם <sup>3220 </sup> <n>of the sea</n> יֵאָסֵֽפוּ׃ <sup>622 </sup> <n>also shall be taken away</n>
4: אַ֥ךְ <sup>389 </sup> <n>Yet</n> אִ֛ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>Yet let no man</n> אַל־ <sup>408 </sup> <n>no</n> יָרֵ֖ב <sup>7378 </sup> <n>strive</n> וְאַל־ <sup>408 </sup> <n>no</n> יוֹכַ֣ח <sup>3198 </sup> <n>nor reprove</n> אִ֑ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>another</n> וְעַמְּךָ֖ <sup>5971 </sup> <n>for thy people</n> כִּמְרִיבֵ֥י <sup>7378 </sup> <n>[are] as they that strive</n> כֹהֵֽן׃ <sup>3548 </sup> <n>with the priest</n>
5: וְכָשַׁלְתָּ֣ <sup>3782 </sup> <n>Therefore shalt thou fall</n> הַיּ֔וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>in the day</n> וְכָשַׁ֧ל <sup>3782 </sup> <n>also shall fall</n> גַּם־ <sup>1571 </sup> <n>also</n> נָבִ֛יא <sup>5030 </sup> <n>and the prophet</n> עִמְּךָ֖ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>by</n> לָ֑יְלָה <sup>3915 </sup> <n>with thee in the night</n> וְדָמִ֖יתִי <sup>1820 </sup> <n>and I will destroy</n> אִמֶּֽךָ׃ <sup>517 </sup> <n>thy mother</n>

7: כְּרֻבָּ֖ם <sup>7235 </sup> <n>abundance</n> כֵּ֣ן <sup>3651 </sup> <n>the more</n> חָֽטְאוּ־ <sup>2398 </sup> <n>so they sinned</n> לִ֑י כְּבוֹדָ֖ם <sup>3519 </sup> <n>their glory</n> בְּקָל֥וֹן <sup>7036 </sup> <n>into shame</n> אָמִֽיר׃ <sup>4171 </sup> <n>against me [therefore] will I change</n>
8: חַטַּ֥את <sup>2403 </sup> <n>the sin</n> עַמִּ֖י <sup>5971 </sup> <n>of my people</n> יֹאכֵ֑לוּ <sup>398 </sup> <n>They eat up</n> וְאֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>toward</n> עֲוֹנָ֖ם <sup>5771 </sup> <n>on their iniquity</n> יִשְׂא֥וּ <sup>5375 </sup> <n>and they set</n> נַפְשֽׁוֹ׃ <sup>5315 </sup> <n>their heart</n>
9: וְהָיָ֥ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>will be like</n> כָעָ֖ם <sup>5971 </sup> <n>And there shall be like people</n> כַּכֹּהֵ֑ן <sup>3548 </sup> <n>like priest</n> וּפָקַדְתִּ֤י <sup>6485 </sup> <n>and I will punish</n> עָלָיו֙ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>for</n> דְּרָכָ֔יו <sup>1870 </sup> <n>them for their ways</n> וּמַעֲלָלָ֖יו <sup>4611 </sup> <n>them their doings</n> אָשִׁ֥יב <sup>7725 </sup> <n>and reward</n> לֽוֹ׃
10: וְאָֽכְלוּ֙ <sup>398 </sup> <n>For they shall eat</n> וְלֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> יִשְׂבָּ֔עוּ <sup>7646 </sup> <n>and not have enough</n> הִזְנ֖וּ <sup>2181 </sup> <n>they shall commit whoredom</n> וְלֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> יִפְרֹ֑צוּ <sup>6555 </sup> <n>and shall not increase</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>Because</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> יְהוָ֥ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>to the LORD</n> עָזְב֖וּ <sup>5800 </sup> <n>because they have left off</n> לִשְׁמֹֽר׃ <sup>8104 </sup> <n>to take heed</n>
